product_name: Belknap Belknap's Waterproof Desolation Canyon River Guide - 3rd Edition
long_description: The expanded and updated Belknap's Waterproof Desolation Canyon River Guide offers detailed information on the 200 mi. trip from Split Mountain to the town of Green River, Utah.
